Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by New York in 2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/21/2019, off Lawrence Barber (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/16/2019, off Buck Gleason (SEA)...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Seattle on 8/14/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/2021, hitting .480 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2021...
Traded from New York to Atlanta on 2/10/2022 (Going to ATL: C Scott Ebbert. Going to NY: CF Stephen Washington)...
Traded from Atlanta to Chicago on 6/20/2022 (Going to ATL: P Jose Raposa, C Michael Tuggle. Going to CHI: C Scott Ebbert)...
Injured on 8/17/2023 with a Bruised Ulna, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2023, hitting .556 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,150,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2024...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,514,286 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/28/2025 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 6-7 weeks...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2025...
1/31/2026: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,514,286 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/2/2026 with a Broken Finger, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2026...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/13/2027 to a 2-year deal worth $1,413,000 per year...
Released by Chicago on 8/19/2028...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/15/2029 to a 4-year deal worth $600,000 per year...
